questions.english: I don't get as much pleasure out of things as others seem to.
questions.translation: 与其他人相比，我从事情中得到的乐趣不那么多。

questions.english: Plenty of people are out to get me.
questions.translation: 很多人都在针对我。

questions.english: People would describe me as reckless.
questions.translation: 人们会说我鲁莽。

questions.english: I feel like I act totally on impulse.
questions.translation: 我感觉我完全是冲动行事。

questions.english: I often have ideas that are too unusual to explain to anyone.
questions.translation: 我常常有一些难以向他人解释的奇特想法。

questions.english: I lose track of conversations because other things catch my attention.
questions.translation: 我会因为被其他事物吸引而对话题失去跟踪。

questions.english: I avoid risky situations.
questions.translation: 我避免危险的情况。

questions.english: When it comes to my emotions, people tell me I'm a 'cold fish'.
questions.translation: 在情感方面，人们说我是个'冷鱼'。

questions.english: I change what I do depending on what others want.
questions.translation: 我会根据别人的要求改变自己的行为。

questions.english: I prefer not to get too close to people.
questions.translation: 我倾向于不与人过于亲近。

questions.english: I often get into physical fights.
questions.translation: 我经常卷入身体冲突。

questions.english: I dread being without someone to love me.
questions.translation: 我害怕没有人爱我。

questions.english: Being rude and unfriendly is just a part of who I am.
questions.translation: 粗鲁和不友好是我的一部分。

questions.english: I do things to make sure people notice me.
questions.translation: 我做事是为了让人注意到我。

questions.english: I usually do what others think I should do.
questions.translation: 我通常会做别人认为我应该做的事。

questions.english: I usually do things on impulse without thinking about what might happen as a result.
questions.translation: 我通常冲动行事，不考虑可能的后果。

questions.english: Even though I know better, I can't stop making rash decisions.
questions.translation: 尽管我知道更好的做法，我还是无法停止做出鲁莽的决定。

questions.english: My emotions sometimes change for no good reason.
questions.translation: 我的情绪有时无缘无故地变化。

questions.english: I really don't care if I make other people suffer.
questions.translation: 我真的不在乎自己是否让其他人受苦。

questions.english: I keep to myself.
questions.translation: 我保持独处。

questions.english: I often say things that others find odd or strange.
questions.translation: 我经常说一些别人觉得奇怪或怪异的话。

questions.english: I always do things on the spur of the moment.
questions.translation: 我总是临时起意做事。

questions.english: Nothing seems to interest me very much.
questions.translation: 似乎没有什么能特别吸引我。

questions.english: Other people seem to think my behavior is weird.
questions.translation: 其他人似乎认为我的行为很怪异。

questions.english: People have told me that I think about things in a really strange way.
questions.translation: 人们告诉我，我的思考方式真的很奇怪。

questions.english: I almost never enjoy life.
questions.translation: 我几乎从不享受生活。

questions.english: I often feel like nothing I do really matters.
questions.translation: 我常常觉得我所做的一切都无关紧要。

questions.english: I snap at people when they do little things that irritate me.
questions.translation: 当别人做一些让我恼怒的小事时，我会对他们发火。

questions.english: I can't concentrate on anything.
questions.translation: 我无法集中注意力做任何事。

questions.english: I'm an energetic person.
questions.translation: 我是一个精力充沛的人。

questions.english: Others see me as irresponsible.
questions.translation: 别人认为我不负责任。

questions.english: I can be mean when I need to be.
questions.translation: 必要时，我可以变得很刻薄。

questions.english: My thoughts often go off in odd or unusual directions.
questions.translation: 我的思维经常朝奇怪或不寻常的方向发展。

questions.english: I've been told that I spend too much time making sure things are exactly in place.
questions.translation: 有人告诉我，我花太多时间确保事物摆放得恰到好处。

questions.english: I avoid risky sports and activities.
questions.translation: 我避免参与危险的运动和活动。

questions.english: I can have trouble telling the difference between dreams and waking life.
questions.translation: 我有时候难以区分梦境和现实生活。

questions.english: Sometimes I get this weird feeling that parts of my body feel like they're dead or not really me.
questions.translation: 有时我会有一种奇怪的感觉，感觉身体的某些部分像是死了或不真实。

questions.english: I am easily angered.
questions.translation: 我很容易生气。

questions.english: I have no limits when it comes to doing dangerous things.
questions.translation: 做危险的事情时，我没有界限。

questions.english: To be honest, I'm just more important than other people.
questions.translation: 老实说，我比其他人更重要。

questions.english: I make up stories about things that happened that are totally untrue.
questions.translation: 我编造了一些完全不真实的事情。

questions.english: People often talk about me doing things I don't remember at all.
questions.translation: 人们经常谈论我做的事情，而我完全不记得。

questions.english: I do things so that people just have to admire me.
questions.translation: 我做事就是为了让人们不得不佩服我。

questions.english: It's weird, but sometimes ordinary objects seem to be a different shape than usual.
questions.translation: 这很奇怪，但有时普通的物体看起来形状不同于平常。

questions.english: I don't have very long-lasting emotional reactions to things.
questions.translation: 我对事物的情绪反应不持久。

questions.english: It is hard for me to stop an activity, even when it’s time to do so.
questions.translation: 即使到了该停止的时候，我也很难停止活动。

questions.english: I'm not good at planning ahead.
questions.translation: 我不擅长提前计划。

questions.english: I do a lot of things that others consider risky.
questions.translation: 我做很多别人认为有风险的事情。

questions.english: People tell me that I focus too much on minor details.
questions.translation: 人们告诉我，我过于关注细节。

questions.english: I worry a lot about being alone.
questions.translation: 我非常担心独处。

questions.english: I've missed out on things because I was busy trying to get something I was doing exactly right.
questions.translation: 因为我忙于尝试把某件事做得完全正确，我错过了一些事情。

questions.english: My thoughts often don't make sense to others.
questions.translation: 我的想法经常让别人感到困惑。

questions.english: I often make up things about myself to help me get what I want.
questions.translation: 我经常编造有关自己的事情来帮助我得到想要的东西。

questions.english: It doesn't really bother me to see other people get hurt.
questions.translation: 看到别人受伤并不真的让我感到困扰。

questions.english: People often look at me as if I'd said something really weird.
questions.translation: 人们经常看着我，好像我说了些非常奇怪的话。

questions.english: People don't realize that I'm flattering them to get something.
questions.translation: 人们没有意识到我是在奉承他们以得到某物。

questions.english: I'd rather be in a bad relationship than be alone.
questions.translation: 我宁愿处在一段不好的关系中，也不愿意独自一人。

questions.english: I usually think before I act.
questions.translation: 我通常在行动之前会思考。

questions.english: I often see vivid dream-like images when I'm falling asleep or waking up.
questions.translation: 我在入睡或醒来时经常看到生动的梦幻般的图像。

questions.english: I keep approaching things the same way, even when it isn’t working.
questions.translation: 即使方法不奏效，我也会一直以同样的方式处理事情。

questions.english: I'm very dissatisfied with myself.
questions.translation: 我对自己非常不满意。

questions.english: I have much stronger emotional reactions than almost everyone else.
questions.translation: 我的情感反应比几乎所有人都强烈。

questions.english: I do what other people tell me to do.
questions.translation: 我会做别人告诉我做的事。

questions.english: I can't stand being left alone, even for a few hours.
questions.translation: 哪怕只是几个小时，我也无法忍受独自一人。

questions.english: I have outstanding qualities that few others possess.
questions.translation: 我有一些少数人才有的卓越品质。

questions.english: The future looks really hopeless to me.
questions.translation: 未来在我看来真的是没有希望。

questions.english: I like to take risks.
questions.translation: 我喜欢冒险。

questions.english: I can't achieve goals because other things capture my attention.
questions.translation: 我无法实现目标，因为其他事情会吸引我的注意。

questions.english: When I want to do something, I don't let the possibility that it might be risky stop me.
questions.translation: 当我想做某事时，我不会因为它可能有风险而停下来。

questions.english: Others seem to think I'm quite odd or unusual.
questions.translation: 别人似乎认为我很奇怪或不寻常。

questions.english: My thoughts are strange and unpredictable.
questions.translation: 我的想法奇特且不可预测。

questions.english: I don't care about other people's feelings.
questions.translation: 我不关心别人的感受。

questions.english: You need to step on some toes to get what you want in life.
questions.translation: 在生活中，要得到你想要的东西，有时需要踩到别人的脚趾。

questions.english: I love getting the attention of other people.
questions.translation: 我喜欢得到别人的注意。

questions.english: I go out of my way to avoid any kind of group activity.
questions.translation: 我特意避开任何形式的团体活动。

questions.english: I can be sneaky if it means getting what I want.
questions.translation: 如果这意味着能得到我想要的东西，我可以变得狡猾。

questions.english: Sometimes when I look at a familiar object, it's somehow like I'm seeing it for the first time.
questions.translation: 有时当我看着一个熟悉的物体时，感觉就像是我第一次看到它。

questions.english: It is hard for me to shift from one activity to another.
questions.translation: 我很难从一项活动转换到另一项。

questions.english: I worry a lot about terrible things that might happen.
questions.translation: 我非常担心可能发生的可怕事情。

questions.english: I have trouble changing how I’m doing something even if what I’m doing isn't going well.
questions.translation: 即使我做的不顺利，我也很难改变做事的方式。

questions.english: The world would be better off if I were dead.
questions.translation: 如果我死了，世界会更好。

questions.english: I keep my distance from people.
questions.translation: 我与人保持距离。

questions.english: I often can't control what I think about.
questions.translation: 我经常无法控制自己的思考。

questions.english: I don't get emotional.
questions.translation: 我不会情绪化。

questions.english: I resent being told what to do, even by people in charge.
questions.translation: 即使是上级，我也不喜欢别人告诉我该做什么。

questions.english: I'm so ashamed by how I've let people down in lots of little ways.
questions.translation: 我为自己在许多小事上让人失望感到非常羞愧。

questions.english: I avoid anything that might be even a little bit dangerous.
questions.translation: 我避开任何可能有一点危险的事情。

questions.english: I have trouble pursuing specific goals even for short periods of time.
questions.translation: 即使是短时间，我也难以追求特定的目标。

questions.english: I prefer to keep romance out of my life.
questions.translation: 我更喜欢让我的生活中没有浪漫。

questions.english: I would never harm another person.
questions.translation: 我绝不会伤害别人。

questions.english: I don't show emotions strongly.
questions.translation: 我不会强烈地表达情感。

questions.english: I have a very short temper.
questions.translation: 我脾气很暴躁。

questions.english: I often worry that something bad will happen due to mistakes I made in the past.
questions.translation: 我经常担心过去的错误会导致不好的事情发生。

questions.english: I have some unusual abilities, like sometimes knowing exactly what someone is thinking.
questions.translation: 我有一些不寻常的能力，比如有时候能准确知道别人在想什么。

questions.english: I get very nervous when I think about the future.
questions.translation: 我在想到未来时会非常紧张。

questions.english: I rarely worry about things.
questions.translation: 我很少担心事情。

questions.english: I enjoy being in love.
questions.translation: 我喜欢恋爱的感觉。

questions.english: I prefer to play it safe rather than take unnecessary chances.
questions.translation: 我更喜欢保守行事，不愿意冒不必要的风险。

questions.english: I sometimes have heard things that others couldn't hear.
questions.translation: 我有时会听到别人听不到的声音。

questions.english: I get fixated on certain things and can't stop.
questions.translation: 我会对某些事情着迷，无法停止。

questions.english: People tell me it's difficult to know what I’m feeling.
questions.translation: 人们告诉我，很难知道我在感受什么。

questions.english: I am a highly emotional person.
questions.translation: 我是一个非常情绪化的人。

questions.english: Others would take advantage of me if they could.
questions.translation: 如果可能，别人会利用我。

questions.english: I often feel like a failure.
questions.translation: 我经常感觉自己是个失败者。

questions.english: If something I do isn't absolutely perfect, it's simply not acceptable.
questions.translation: 如果我做的事情不是绝对完美的，那就是不可接受的。

questions.english: I often have unusual experiences, such as sensing the presence of someone who isn't actually there.
questions.translation: 我经常有不寻常的经历，比如感觉到实际上并不存在的人的存在。

questions.english: I'm good at making people do what I want them to do.
questions.translation: 我擅长让人们按照我的想法行事。

questions.english: I break off relationships if they start to get close.
questions.translation: 如果关系开始变得亲密，我会断绝关系。

questions.english: I'm always worrying about something.
questions.translation: 我总是在担心某事。

questions.english: I worry about almost everything.
questions.translation: 我几乎什么都担心。

questions.english: I like standing out in a crowd.
questions.translation: 我喜欢在人群中脱颖而出。

questions.english: I don't mind a little risk now and then.
questions.translation: 偶尔冒一点险，我不介意。

questions.english: My behavior is often bold and grabs peoples' attention.
questions.translation: 我的行为常常大胆，能吸引人们的注意。

questions.english: I'm better than almost everyone else.
questions.translation: 我比几乎所有人都要好。

questions.english: People complain about my need to have everything all arranged.
questions.translation: 人们抱怨我需要把一切都安排妥当。

questions.english: I always make sure I get back at people who wrong me.
questions.translation: 我总是确保对那些伤害我的人进行报复。

questions.english: I'm always on my guard for someone trying to trick or harm me.
questions.translation: 我总是警惕着别人试图欺骗或伤害我。

questions.english: I have trouble keeping my mind focused on what needs to be done.
questions.translation: 我难以集中注意力完成需要做的事情。

questions.english: I talk about suicide a lot.
questions.translation: 我经常谈论自杀。

questions.english: I'm just not very interested in having sexual relationships.
questions.translation: 我对性关系不太感兴趣。

questions.english: I get stuck on things a lot.
questions.translation: 我经常对事情纠结不清。

questions.english: I get emotional easily, often for very little reason.
questions.translation: 我很容易情绪化，往往无缘无故。

questions.english: Even though it drives other people crazy, I insist on absolute perfection in everything I do.
questions.translation: 尽管这让其他人疯狂，我坚持在我做的每件事中追求绝对的完美。

questions.english: I almost never feel happy about my day-to-day activities.
questions.translation: 我几乎从不对日常活动感到快乐。

questions.english: Sweet-talking others helps me get what I want.
questions.translation: 甜言蜜语帮助我得到我想要的东西。

questions.english: Sometimes you need to exaggerate to get ahead.
questions.translation: 有时你需要夸大其词以取得进展。

questions.english: I fear being alone in life more than anything else.
questions.translation: 我最害怕的是一生孤独。

questions.english: I get stuck on one way of doing things, even when it's clear it won't work.
questions.translation: 即使明知不可行，我也会固执地坚持一种做法。

questions.english: I'm often pretty careless with my own and others' things.
questions.translation: 我经常对自己和别人的东西不够小心。

questions.english: I am a very anxious person.
questions.translation: 我是一个非常焦虑的人。

questions.english: People are basically trustworthy.
questions.translation: 基本上，人们是值得信赖的。

questions.english: I am easily distracted.
questions.translation: 我很容易分心。

questions.english: It seems like I'm always getting a 'raw deal' from others.
questions.translation: 我总感觉别人对我不公。

questions.english: I don't hesitate to cheat if it gets me ahead.
questions.translation: 如果能让我取得优势，我不会犹豫作弊。

questions.english: I check things several times to make sure they are perfect.
questions.translation: 我会反复检查事情以确保它们是完美的。

questions.english: I don't like spending time with others.
questions.translation: 我不喜欢和别人共度时光。

questions.english: I feel compelled to go on with things even when it makes little sense to do so.
questions.translation: 即使继续下去没有多大意义，我也感觉被迫要继续。

questions.english: I never know where my emotions will go from moment to moment.
questions.translation: 我永返不知道我的情绪会如何变化。

questions.english: I have seen things that weren't really there.
questions.translation: 我看到了一些实际上不存在的东西。

questions.english: It is important to me that things are done in a certain way.
questions.translation: 对我来说，按照特定的方式做事很重要。

questions.english: I always expect the worst to happen.
questions.translation: 我总是期待最糟糕的事情发生。

questions.english: I try to tell the truth even when it's hard.
questions.translation: 即使困难，我也试图说出真相。

questions.english: I believe that some people can move things with their minds.
questions.translation: 我相信有些人可以用思想移动物体。

questions.english: I can't focus on things for very long.
questions.translation: 我无法长时间专注于事物。

questions.english: I steer clear of romantic relationships.
questions.translation: 我避开浪漫关系。

questions.english: I'm not interested in making friends.
questions.translation: 我对交朋友不感兴趣。

questions.english: I say as little as possible when dealing with people.
questions.translation: 我在和人打交道时尽可能少说话。

questions.english: I'm useless as a person.
questions.translation: 作为一个人，我毫无用处。

questions.english: I'll do just about anything to keep someone from abandoning me.
questions.translation: 为了防止别人抛弃我，我几乎什么都愿意做。

questions.english: Sometimes I can influence other people just by sending my thoughts to them.
questions.translation: 有时候我可以通过向别人发送我的思想来影响他们。

questions.english: Life looks pretty bleak to me.
questions.translation: 生活在我看来非常暗淡。

questions.english: I think about things in odd ways that don't make sense to most people.
questions.translation: 我以大多数人无法理解的奇怪方式思考问题。

questions.english: I don't care if my actions hurt others.
questions.translation: 我不在乎我的行为是否伤害了别人。

questions.english: Sometimes I feel 'controlled' by thoughts that belong to someone else.
questions.translation: 有时我感觉被别人的思想'控制'了。

questions.english: I really live life to the fullest.
questions.translation: 我真正地充分地活着。

questions.english: I make promises that I don't really intend to keep.
questions.translation: 我做出了一些实际上并不打算履行的承诺。

questions.english: Nothing seems to make me feel good.
questions.translation: 似乎没有什么能让我感觉良好。

questions.english: I get irritated easily by all sorts of things.
questions.translation: 各种事情都很容易让我感到恼怒。

questions.english: I do what I want regardless of how unsafe it might be.
questions.translation: 不管多么不安全，我都做我想做的事。

questions.english: I often forget to pay my bills.
questions.translation: 我经常忘记支付账单。

questions.english: I don't like to get too close to people.
questions.translation: 我不喜欢与人过于亲近。

questions.english: I'm good at conning people.
questions.translation: 我擅长欺骗人。

questions.english: Everything seems pointless to me.
questions.translation: 一切对我来说似乎都毫无意义。

questions.english: I never take risks.
questions.translation: 我从不冒险。

questions.english: I get emotional over every little thing.
questions.translation: 每一件小事都会让我情绪化。

questions.english: It's no big deal if I hurt other peoples' feelings.
questions.translation: 伤害别人的感情没什么大不了的。

questions.english: I never show emotions to others.
questions.translation: 我从不向他人展示情感。

questions.english: I often feel just miserable.
questions.translation: 我经常感觉非常痛苦。

questions.english: I have no worth as a person.
questions.translation: 作为一个人，我毫无价值。

questions.english: I am usually pretty hostile.
questions.translation: 我通常相当有敌意。

questions.english: I've skipped town to avoid responsibilities.
questions.translation: 我为了逃避责任曾逃离过城镇。

questions.english: I've been told more than once that I have a number of odd quirks or habits.
questions.translation: 有不止一次人告诉我，我有很多奇怪的癖好或习惯。

questions.english: I like being a person who gets noticed.
questions.translation: 我喜欢成为一个引人注目的人。

questions.english: I'm always fearful or on edge about bad things that might happen.
questions.translation: 我总是对可能发生的坏事感到恐惧或紧张。

questions.english: I never want to be alone.
questions.translation: 我永远不想独自一人。

questions.english: I keep trying to make things perfect, even when I've gotten them as good as they're likely to get.
questions.translation: 即使事情已经做得很好，我仍然试图使它们更完美。

questions.english: I rarely feel that people I know are trying to take advantage of me.
questions.translation: 我很少觉得我认识的人试图利用我。

questions.english: I know I'll commit suicide sooner or later.
questions.translation: 我知道我迟早会自杀。

questions.english: I've achieved far more than almost anyone I know.
questions.translation: 我取得的成就远超我认识的几乎所有人。

questions.english: I can certainly turn on the charm if I need to get my way.
questions.translation: 如果我需要达到目的，我肯定能够发挥魅力。

questions.english: My emotions are unpredictable.
questions.translation: 我的情绪是不可预测的。

questions.english: I don't deal with people unless I have to.
questions.translation: 除非必须，否则我不与人打交道。

questions.english: I don't care about other peoples' problems.
questions.translation: 我不关心别人的问题。

questions.english: I don't react much to things that seem to make others emotional.
questions.translation: 对于似乎让其他人情绪化的事情，我反应不大。

questions.english: I have several habits that others find eccentric or strange.
questions.translation: 我有几个别人觉得古怪或奇怪的习惯。

questions.english: I avoid social events.
questions.translation: 我避开社交活动。

questions.english: I deserve special treatment.
questions.translation: 我应得到特殊待遇。

questions.english: It makes me really angry when people insult me in even a minor way.
questions.translation: 即使是轻微的侮辱，也会让我非常生气。

questions.english: I rarely get enthusiastic about anything.
questions.translation: 我很少对任何事情感到热情。

questions.english: I suspect that even my so-called 'friends' betray me a lot.
questions.translation: 我怀疑即便是所谓的'朋友'也经常背叛我。

questions.english: I crave attention.
questions.translation: 我渴望注意力。

questions.english: Sometimes I think someone else is removing thoughts from my head.
questions.translation: 有时我觉得有人在把思想从我的脑海中抹去。

questions.english: I have periods in which I feel disconnected from the world or from myself.
questions.translation: 我有时会感觉与世界或自己脱节。

questions.english: I often see unusual connections between things that most people miss.
questions.translation: 我经常看到大多数人错过的事物之间不寻常的联系。

questions.english: I don't think about getting hurt when I’m doing things that might be dangerous.
questions.translation: 我在做可能危险的事情时不会考虑受伤的后果。

questions.english: I simply won't put up with things being out of their proper places.
questions.translation: 我无法忍受事物不在其应有的位置。

questions.english: I often have to deal with people who are less important than me.
questions.translation: 我经常不得不处理比我地位低的人。

questions.english: I sometimes hit people to remind them who's in charge.
questions.translation: 我有时会打人，以提醒他们谁是老大。

questions.english: I get pulled off-task by even minor distractions.
questions.translation: 即使是轻微的干扰也会让我分心。

questions.english: I enjoy making people in control look stupid.
questions.translation: 我喜欢让掌控者看起来愚蠢。

questions.english: I just skip appointments or meetings if I’m not in the mood.
questions.translation: 如果我心情不好，我就会跳过约会或会议。

questions.english: I try to do what others want me to do.
questions.translation: 我尝试做别人希望我做的事。

questions.english: I prefer being alone to having a close romantic partner.
questions.translation: 我宁愿独自一人也不想有亲密的恋人。

questions.english: I am very impulsive.
questions.translation: 我非常冲动。

questions.english: I often have thoughts that make sense to me but that other people say are strange.
questions.translation: 我经常有一些对我有意义但别人觉得奇怪的想法。

questions.english: I use people to get what I want.
questions.translation: 我利用人来得到我想要的东西。

questions.english: I don't see the point in feeling guilty about things I've done that have hurt other people.
questions.translation: 我不觉得为我做过的伤害他人的事情感到内疚有什么意义。

questions.english: Most of the time I don't see the point in being friendly.
questions.translation: 大多数时候，我觉得友好没有意义。

questions.english: I've had some really weird experiences that are very difficult to explain.
questions.translation: 我有过一些非常难以解释的奇怪经历。

questions.english: I follow through on commitments.
questions.translation: 我会坚守承诺。

questions.english: I like to draw attention to myself.
questions.translation: 我喜欢吸引别人的注意。

questions.english: I feel guilty much of the time.
questions.translation: 大部分时间我都感到内疚。

questions.english: I often 'zone out' and then suddenly come to and realize that a lot of time has passed.
questions.translation: 我经常发呆，然后突然回过神来，意识到已经过去了很长时间。

questions.english: Lying comes easily to me.
questions.translation: 对我来说，撒谎很容易。

questions.english: I hate to take chances.
questions.translation: 我讨厌冒险。

questions.english: I'm nasty and short to anybody who deserves it.
questions.translation: 对于那些应得的人，我会态度恶劣和简短。

questions.english: Things around me often feel unreal, or more real than usual.
questions.translation: 我周围的事物经常感觉不真实，或比平时更真实。

questions.english: I'll stretch the truth if it's to my advantage.
questions.translation: 如果对我有利，我会夸大事实。

questions.english: It is easy for me to take advantage of others.
questions.translation: 我很容易利用别人。

questions.english: I have a strict way of doing things.
questions.translation: 我有一套严格的做事方式。
